Transcribe, Translate, and Read

Transcribe and translate audio and text content in your native tongue.

Audio Transcription

Accurately & easily transcribe podcasts and other audio content into text.

Intelligent Translation

Translate webpages, subtitles, and other text content into your native language.

Natural Reading

Read translated content with natural and fluent speech, enhancing the auditory experience.

Offline Access

Once transcribed & translated done, content is stored offline for quick access.
